item.description:
If there ever was a film that wanted a discussion afterward, this film is it. Thanks to Loucindy for suggesting it. I'll be there about 4:30 or so, we can check out the art and hang out afterward to discuss.


Examined Life pulls philosophy out of academic journals and classrooms, and puts it back on the streets. Filmmaker Astra Taylor accompanies some of todayâ€™s most influential thinkers on a series of unique excursions through places and spaces that hold particular resonance for them and their ideas. Featuring Cornel West, Avital Ronell, Peter Singer, Kwarne Anthony Appiah, Martha Nussbaum, Michael Hardt, Slavoj Zizek, Judith Butler and Sunaura Taylor.

Checkout the website: http://www.zeitgeistf...
item.how_to_find_us: I still look like my picture, glasses, pony tail.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: The Examined Life
